revised_title: Obituary of Thomas John I'Anson Bromwich
tldr: The article is an obituary for Thomas John I'Anson Bromwich, a versatile and accomplished English mathematician. He made significant contributions to algebra, analysis, and mathematical physics. His work covered a wide range of fields, and he was a dedicated teacher and active member of the London Mathematical Society. Despite his mastery of technique, Bromwich lacked the power of imagination and struggled with health issues in his later years.
